title: Bug 108822 - More efficient logic required for disk sorting when processing border values for row data
OB:
When performing a disk sort on 40000 rows of data, if the program is set to process less than 40000 rows, the following operations are executed by DtE: 
1. [Operation description missing]
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Sort data on disk using 40000 rows
2. Set the program to process less than 40000 rows
3. Observe the following operations performed by DtE:
   a. Save the file as a temporary file
   b. Load the file into memory
   c. Sort the data
   d. Save the file to a temp file
